entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document
entry.content:
The attached version of the document has been updated to reflect all of the changes requested by Richard Hughes-Jones.

    This document is now ready to go to be issued for public comment.

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to initial review
  • Assignee changed from Richard Hughes-Jones to Alan Sill

Thanks for this, Guy. Now that AD review is complete, it needs Steering Council approval prior to public comment. We'll schedule it for as soon as possible.
- Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to public comment
  • Assignee changed from Alan Sill to Andre Merzky

Steering council approved during the January telecon. This and #250 are heading for public comment. Once it is announced, please invite your stakeholders to provide comments. Thanks,
Greg

comment tracker has been created at https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/24 and can be announced.

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to AD review
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Richard Hughes-Jones

Public comment is complete. However, zero comments were received: https://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/24

We will schedule a discussion of next steps for the next standards council telecon.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document

    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document
entry.content:
• Status changed from final review to to be published
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

Per the Standards Council telecon of December 8, this is now approved for publication.

It will be GFD-R-P.220.

Once Andre uploads the final version, I will announce to the community. Thanks and congratulations to the authors/editors for this contribution to the OGF document series.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document
entry.content:
Hi Andre/Greg,

    This document never got published as GFD-R-P.220

    Could please check?

    Thanks,
    Guy

entry.title: Editor - document #251: NSI Network Service Agent Description Document
entry.content: Sorry for the delay, Guy. I'm following up to move this forward...

Thank you,
Greg
